page.title: 02LOCAL NEWS - MAY 1985
page.content: { {Americans Visit Dunbar}- Two hundred American teenagers were welcomed to East Lothian when they spent a day here a part of a prize winning trip to Britain. Their trip also included a tour of Lennoxlove House and a guided walk around part of the John Muir Country Park where the they had a barbecue. {Preparing For marriage } - Marriage preparation classes are currently being run for couples who intend to wed at Belhaven parish church this summer.The class,which discusses the problems and stresses often encountered during matrimony,is taken by the minister and marriage guidance councillor.Although matters are discussed in an open and straightforward way;Mr Twaddle said that the first evening was hilarious.
